normal_scam.info: Cold-calling: You receive a cold call about your pension

accelerator.info: Free advice: You accept ‘free’ financial advice
accelerator.icon: pound signs with a cross through it

speedy.info: Time pressure: You feel pressured to make an immediate decision

zig_zag.info: Fake Scam Vigilante: You believe a scammer is authorised by the FCA

splitter.info: Offered withdrawal: You’re promised early access to your pension

black_out.info: Black out: You engaged with a company because they offered a unique or limited investment opportunity

diagonal.info: Cold-calling: You receive a cold call about your pension

normal_boon.info: Boon: Check FCA registered - get FCA number

refuse.info: Refuse: You refuse to discuss your pension with strangers

pension_wise.info: Pension Wise: You get impartial information from Pension Wise

thinking_about.info: Thining About: You take your time and won’t be rushed

invisiblity_boon.info: FCA: You check the FCA Register

dont_transfer.info: Don't transfer: You refuse to transfer your pension for early withdrawal
